DOC.brief_summary: Peripheral blood will be taken from the enrolled patients at National University Hospital and from healthy volunteers. ADCC assay will be performed for evaluating efficacy of new medicine candidates.
DOC.criteria: For the gastric cancer patients, patients with 21 years of age and above and younger than 80 years old who have gastric cancer can enroll in this study. For the healthy donors, healthy volunteers with 21 years of age and above and younger than 80 years old can enroll in this study. (A) Age of <21 and >80 years old (B) Pregnancy (C) Decision of unsuitableness by Principal Investigator or physicianincharge
